title: [Large-Scale] Environmental Education Content Engagement Program Utilizing ADDIE and Isman Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary Environmental Science Knowledge and General Understanding of Social Issues
context.additional_context: Customized education to enhance practical understanding of environmental issues for adult learners in workplace or job-seeking contexts

learning_goals: Learners must analyze the social impact of environmental issues with 80% or higher accuracy through ADDIE model-based environmental education content
In interaction activities following the Isman method, learners must collaboratively propose environmental solutions at least three times and achieve a creativity score of 4 or higher (5-point scale)
Through a real-time online assessment and feedback system, learners must record 4.5 or higher (5-point scale) in interest surveys about environmental education content

resources: Customized EECII (Educational Environment and Culture Inventory Instrument) Survey Tool

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
